import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Link, json, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import ContactServices from '../../ContactServices/ContactServices' import Spinner from '../../Spinner/Spinner' const ContactList = () => { let [state, setState] = useState({ contacts: [], loading: false, errorMessage: "" }) useEffect(() => { let promise = new Promise((res, rej) => { setState({ ...state, loading: true }) let response = ContactServices.getAllContacts(); res(response) rej("error") }) promise.then((res1) => { setState({ ...state, loading: false, contacts: res1.data }) }).catch((rej1) => { setState({ ...state, loading: false, errorMessage: alert("data is not available") }) }) }, []) const deleteContact = (contactId) => { console.log(contactId) setState(contacts.filter(contact=>{ contact.id!==contactId })) } let { contacts, loading, errorMessage } = state; console.log(contacts) return ( 
        {JSON.stringify(contacts)}

Conatct Manager New

{ loading ? : { contacts.length > 0 && contacts.map((contact) => { return (
  • Name: {contact.name}
  • Email: {contact.email}
  • Contact: {contact.contact}
) }) } }
) } export default ContactList
